Classes

These are nice data types for dealing with... Data!

obj_match
class obj_match {
int result;
object * objects;
string text;
}
The class used for object matching returns.

obj_match_context
class obj_match_context {
int ordinal;
int number_included;
int * fraction;
int ignore_rest;
int no_ambiguous;
object him;
object her;
object it;
object * plural;
}
This class used to retain context over various invocations of the parser.
